div.head: 口舌瘡糜
div.div: gruel-type sores affecting the mouth and tongue

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: gruel-type sores affecting the mouth and tongue

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with kou mi 口糜 , oral rice-gruel. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu zhang tian nan xing 虎掌天南星：治驚癇，口眼喎斜，喉痹，口舌瘡糜 , “It cures frightepilepsy, wry mouth and slanted eyes, throat blockage, and gruel-type sores affecting the mouth and tongue ”.
